definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The cake maker shakes a naked snake with the qusimilarg rake without sake.
sentences.chinese: 蛋糕制造者无缘无故地用寒战的耙子摆一条赤裸的蛇。

sentences.english: Sometimes, I dress like a lawn guy and carry a rake.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，我拿一个耙子想一个修正草坪的家伙。

sentences.english: The cake dor shakes a naked snake dawn the quaking rake lacking sake.
sentences.chinese: 蛋糕制造者无缘无故地用抖动的耙子摇一条赤的蛇。

sentences.english: But is she very ill?' I asked, flinging down my rake and tying my bonnet.
sentences.chinese: “她的病很严重吗？”我问道，扔下耙子，系上帽子。

sentences.english: The cake maker all-overs a naked snake with the agitation rake without account.
sentences.chinese: 蛋糕制造者平白无故地用抖动的耙子摇一条赤裸的蛇。

sentences.english: The gardener rakes up the beds (the walks) (with a rake).
sentences.chinese: 请用耙子把花园的小路耙平。

sentences.english: A bad gardener quarrels with his rake .
sentences.chinese: 一名糟糕的园丁怪怨他的耙子。

sentences.english: Rake the leaves into a large, tall pile.
sentences.chinese: 用耙子把树叶推成一个又大又高的堆。

sentences.english: Then the swish of leaves colliding as my rake herded them together.
sentences.chinese: 然后，用耙子把叶子聚拢到一起时发出了叶子碰撞声。

sentences.english: Rake the leaves and heap them by the garage .
sentences.chinese: 用耙子把叶子收在一起堆在汽车库旁边。

sentences.english: There was music as I put rake to leaf.
sentences.chinese: 耙子与叶子一接触就奏出了音乐。

sentences.english: With an ancient, rusty rake I went to work.
sentences.chinese: 我拿了把古老的生锈的耙子去耙叶子。

sentences.english: The main difference between rakes is how the head is made.
sentences.chinese: 耙子的主要不同之处在于靶头的制作方法。

sentences.english: He raked the dead leaves together every morning.
sentences.chinese: 他每天清晨用耙子将枯叶耙到一起。

sentences.english: I asked, flinging down my rake and tying my bonnet.
sentences.chinese: 我问道，扔下耙子，系上帽子。

sentences.english: Run a garden rake along both sides of the car.
sentences.chinese: 把花园的耙子放在车两边。

definition: wooden club (used to beat clothes in washing)
